plugins.name: vault-worktree
plugins.description: Automate Vault project version and branch switching with smart detection, interactive setup, and primary worktree management. Reduces manual version changes from 20-40 minutes to <5 seconds (v2.1).
plugins.migration-guide:
Run: /vault-worktree:worktree-init
Automatic migration from v1.x with zero manual work

2.1.0: NEW: Automatic branch detection and smart recommendations (A1)
NEW: Interactive setup mode with guided step-by-step flow (A3)
NEW: Primary worktree awareness in switch-version command (A2)
NEW: Optional version parameter - defaults to primary worktree
NEW: Flexible version matching (R2027.1, 2027.1, 2027 all work)
NEW: Branch recommendation system (identifies latest, stable, previous)
IMPROVED: Better user guidance with recommendations and explanations
IMPROVED: Smarter defaults for common workflows
2.0.0: NEW: Branch-based directory naming (vault-R2027.1 instead of vault-2027)
NEW: Primary worktree concept - designate main development version
NEW: Automatic cleanup of v1.x style directories
IMPROVED: Better status display with primary marker
BREAKING: Old v1.x directory names no longer supported
1.0.0: Initial release with basic version switching
